== Introduction ==
Since Oneiric UDS it has been discussed about the creation of a set of tools allowing the creation of localized ISOs. Relevants links:
* UDS Oneiric <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DesktopTeam/Specs/Oneiric/LocalizedCDImageTools|Spec]]</nowiki>.
* Oneiric <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OneiricOcelot/LocalizedImagesRollout|Brainstorming]]</nowiki>.
* Precise <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/community-p-localized-iso-community-growth|Spec]]</nowiki>.
* <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/questions/95190/what-is-an-ubuntu-localized-image-and-how-do-i-create-one|HowTo]]</nowiki> from askubuntu.com
Since 12.04 the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-it|Italian LoCo Team]]</nowiki> committed itself in creating the Italian localized ISO every LTS.

== Welcome! ==
In this page the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-it|Italian LoCo Team]]</nowiki> will collect all the informations in English about the release of the Italian localized Iso.

== Building tools ==
* Image building will be performed with <nowiki>[[apt:--ubuntu-defaults-builder|ubuntu-defaults-builder]]</nowiki> tools. 
* The Italian team developed some <nowiki>[[ItalianCD-Tools|additional tools]]</nowiki> for simplifying the debugging and test procedures, since the '''ubuntu-defaults-image''' command builds the image every time from scratch and takes about one hour.
* After precise release, we developed <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ItalianCD/CloudBuild|a script]]</nowiki> for semplifying the image building in the Amazon Cloud.
